doc.after: Philadelphia is served by the Southeastern Pennsylvania Transportation Authority SEPTA which operates buses trains rapid transit trolleys and trackless trolleys throughout Philadelphia the four Pennsylvania suburban counties of Bucks Chester Delaware and Montgomery in addition to service to Mercer County New Jersey and New Castle County Delaware The city s subway opened in 1907 is the third oldest in America
